title: Project: Portfolio Optimization
content:
## Modern Portfolio Theory (MPT)

Goal: Maximize return for a given level of risk (Efficient Frontier).

### Mathematics

Minimize Variance: $w^T \Sigma w$
Subject to: $w^T \mu = TargetReturn$ and $\sum w = 1$

Where $w$ is weights, $\Sigma$ is covariance matrix, $\mu$ is expected returns.

### Black-Litterman Model

Combines market equilibrium with investor "views" (subjective predictions) to produce more stable weights than raw MPT.
